Auto-Submit_Invoices_for_Approval.description: If true, the Invoice will be submitted automatically for approval

Automatically_Generate_Installments.description: If true, the Billing Schedule will generate installments automatically

Automatically_Regenerate_Installments.description: If true, the Billing Schedule will re-generate installments automatically

Automatically_Submit_Schedule_for_Approv.description: if true, automatically Submit Schedule for Approval

Automatically_Submit_Schedule_via_Contra.description: If true, the Billing Schedule will be submitted automatically
